document.full_text: anheuser-busch inbev , the world's largest brewer, suffered a first drop in beer sales for a year and half as price hikes, rain in brazil and high u.s. unemployment deterred drinkers.
document.title: ab inbev beer sales drop on brazil rain, u.s. jobs
lines_and_colors: anheuser-busch inbev , the world's largest brewer, suffered a first drop in beer sales for a year and half as price hikes, rain in brazil and high u.s. unemployment deterred drinkers.
